pattern: ERROR: cli Error: World state trees are out of sync, please delete your data directory and re-sync
message: World state trees are out of sync - node needs resync
solution:
1. Stop the node container. Use option 13
2. Delete data from the folder: sudo rm -rf /root/.aztec/alpha-testnet/data/
3. Run the container. Use option 14

1. Stop node
2. Remove database files
3. Restart node
